### âœ¨ What is HyperBox?
- **20x faster container starts** (100ms vs 30-140s Docker Desktop)
- **Project-centric isolation** - Keep your containers organized
- **Multi-runtime support** - Docker, crun, youki, and WASM runtimes
- **Full CLI + desktop UI** - Choose your workflow
- **Open source (MIT licensed)** - Transparent and community-driven
